original_text: They wanted to take hold of him and put him in prison. But they did not try to do it because they were afraid of the people. The people thought that Jesus was a prophet from God.
korean_text: 잡고자 하나 무리를 무서워하니 이는 그들이 예수를 선지자로 앎이었더라

sentences.original_text: They wanted to take hold of him
But they did not try to do it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그렇게 하려고 시도하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: because they were afraid of the people
that Jesus was a prophet from God
